title: The New Black Cleaver
body: How do you guys think the new Black Cleaver, and its build path, would be on Zed, Talon, Riven and Jayce?

replies.body: i think that black cleaver now would be well on tanky bruisers like renekton and nasus, it might not work as well on the others but i think now that it has increased health and the stacks would be better for someone who could last longer so therefore i think it will be better on tanks/bruisers and less on assassins, just my opinion though :D
Nasus doesn't want this item, it would take way to long to get the 6 stacks of Cleaver up for his Q's (only his auto's/Q's cleave the enemy).
it's only going to be good on tanky bruisers who usually buy penatration, like j4 or vi

The new Black Cleaver with its 20% CDR will be the first thing Rivens and Fioras and any duellers/bruisers at any lane or jungle will build because they will faceroll and snowball teams to surrendering. 20% CDR is far too strong.
I'm most worried about Rivens who will now be even stronger. 
Countless other AD Bruisers will benefit from it immensely.
I think it would work great on Urgot
I thought you were kidding but then I realised this could work.

His Q will give him movespeed while he slows with W.

GG.

Seems fine to me, It's basically stronger, and the main difference is it's easier to build.

You still probably want brut first on most of the champs above, but building black cleaver would still be a thing.
